about_the_game:
NEONPIXEL: Mega Spooky set is a collection of multiple packs that offer extensive options to create various levels.
You can create spooky levels themed around Witchcraft, hunting witches, or a sleepy village, along with dark and blood forests, and more with the WITCHCRAFT PACK.
But that's not all! The set also includes MONSTER ISLAND PACK, where you can create camps and explore prehistoric vegetation and encounter various monsters.
The third pack, ALIEN BIO, provides assets to create an alien slime toxic world ruled by aliens who perform experiments in their laboratories.

Contents
--WITCHCRAFT PACK--
characters:13 sheet
tilesets:14 sheet
faces:8 sheet

--MONSTER ISLAND PACK--
battlebacks2:10 sheet
characters:19 sheet
faces:27 sheet
sv_enemies:19 sheet
tilesets:6 sheet

--ALIEN BIO PACK--
characters:58 sheet
tilesets:14 sheet
faces:37 sheet
parallaxes:11 sheet
tilesets:43 sheet
